About Me

Greetings, I’m Ramaraj. I’m a software engineer with 10 years of experience in Mobile Application Development, living in Chennai, India. I am a fan of programming, gaming, and innovation. I’m also interested in technology and reading. I have strong experience in iOS, Android native and Xamarin app development. I am a beginner in Node.js


I possess a sharp eye for detail, which I use to find even the smallest errors in text. I work well under pressure and can produce high-quality work in short periods of time. I have strong interpersonal skills and work with a wide variety of people.

eFleetSuite

eFleetSuite is a complete ELD solution offered by Trimble. In the US and Canada, there are regulations for truck drivers about how much time they drive. eFleetSuite solutions track and report if there are any violations.


This app is developed using Xamarin-Android, heavily uses intents to communicate with other partner apps.

android xamarin-native xamarin-android xamarin sqlite c#

Trimble Ag Mobile

Trimble Ag mobile is used for precision farming. Farmers can enter their field details, enter details about tillage, planing, spraying, track harvest records … It offers real time fleet management, different map overlays, weather forecast, soil sampling …

ios xamarin-native xamarin-ios xamarin sqlite c# agile

IPA Keyboard

Phonetic Keyboard is a custom keyboard extension for iOS. The app features 8 different keyboards for different languages which have different phonetics. The project was developed in Swift and is compatible with both the iPhone and iPad.

ios objective-c extension iphone ipad

AlcoChange

AlcoChange is an app that helps people to keep control of their alcohol consumption. The app also connects with the AlcoChange Breathalyser that can detect the user’s blood alcohol level. This app is developed in Objective C uses audio framework to communicate with the hardware.

ios objective-c iphone healthcare agile

Blue Dot Parking

Blue Dot Parking app helps the users to find the available parking places nearby and book it. The app works with the Bluetooth low energy, and the user’s activity (enter/exit), parking time are calculated automatically. The users never have to take their mobile phone for all this.

ios objective-c iphone ipad

PalmAgent Softwares

Palmagent has over 30 solutions that give the accurate estimate of the house to the real estate professionals. The app also has so many useful tools for the real estate and banking professionals. The app is available to all the major OS and I have worked on its iOS and Mac version.

ios iphone mac ipad objective-c
